div.div: 1. Candidates are requested to report at test center 2 hours prior to the start of test session.
2. Entry to the exam center will be closed 45 minutes before the start of test.

3. Candidates are required to print their admit cards and bring the same to the test center along with original CNIC/ Form-B/ NICOPor a document with Photo ID such as Passport, original Matric/FSc certificate bearing photograph, etc.
4. Use of unfair means is strictly prohibited in exam hall.
5. Mobile phones/calculators and any other electronic gadgetry are not allowed in exam center.
6. If any candidate is found in possession of any restricted gadgets or items, his/her test paper will be cancelled immediately.
7. No candidate will be allowed to leave the hall before completion of exam.

8. For Computer Based Test Only . Candidates are required to remember the admission's portal password, same will also be used for Computer Based Testing. If necessary, stationery for the test will be provided by the NUTECH.
9. For Paper Based Test Only . Please ensure to bring your own blue/black pen (ball point) for marking the answer sheets.
10. Admit card is to be retained by candidates until the admission process is over.
11. Result will be available at NUTECH website within 72 hours.
12. For location guide map is available on NUTECH website.
This is computer generated document downloaded on

ul.li: Candidate will be tested as per his previous qualification as under :-
FSc (Pre Engg) will be tested for Math, Physics, Chemistry, English.
ICS will be tested for Math, Physics, Computer, English.
FSc (Pre Medical) will be tested for Physics, Chemistry,Gen Arithmatics, English.
DAE (Any Discipline) will be tested primarily from DAE syllabus.
Candidates are requested to report at test center one hour before start of Exam.
Entry to the exam center will be closed one hour before the start of test.
No candidate will be allowed to leave the hall before completion of exam.
Candidates are required to leave the campus immediately after completing test.
Mobile phones/calculators and any other electronic gadget are not allowed in exam center.

div.p: Candidates are required to print their admit cards and bring the same to the test center along with original CNIC/ Form-B/ NICOP or a document with Photo ID such as Passport, original Matric/FSc certificate bearing photograph, etc.

ul.li: Use of unfair means is strictly prohibited.
If any candidate is found in possession of any restricted gadgets or items, his/her test will be cancelled immediately.
Mask, Gloves and Hand Sanitizer is mandatory requirement for all the candidates.
Candidate’s Body Temperature would be checked at gate and in case of high temperature/ fever symptoms the candidate would not be allowed to appear in the test
Always maintain Social Distance while moving towards test centre.
Mask gathering is not allowed and the movement in premises is restricted to not more than two personnel side by side with six feet of distance with face mask ON.
Parking inside the campus is not allowed. Please make pick and drop arrangements, accordingly
